payload.name: memory-tiers-hbm-dram-ssd-object-store
payload.title: Memory tiers (HBM/DRAM/SSD/object store): map cognitive tiers explicitly
payload.formal: latency/cost hierarchy demands explicit placement and eviction.
payload.apm2_mapping:
APM2 already has:

* **working context** (episode/session),
* **episodic ledger** (append-only events),
* **artifacts/evidence** (CAS),
* and likely a **semantic index** (future).
  Make tiering explicit: working memory is lossy; ledger+CAS are authoritative. Anything you can’t replay from ledger+CAS is a design defect.
